And in truth he is doing a lot of campaigning he was expected they set an August to spend upwards of forty days on the road campaigning for Republican candidates heading into the midterms and so we've seen him doing that you know he has been all over the country and swing states and we're likely to see that continue and the next four weeks and you know um I also think however when it comes to North Korea
That you know may provide kind of a convenient

Et cetera the U.S has been picking fights with you know obviously there's a trade war with China
Um so I think that's really what we're seeing here is Trump I keep in mind that Trump's someone that
Immediately after his summit with Kim declared that North Korea was no longer a nuclear power which wasn't really or nuclear threat which wasn't accurate at all and hasn't turned out to be accurate so I think Trump is you know basically spiking the ball and the end zone but you know trying to hold that nobody notices the ball ... fifty yard line
Yeah and the president has moved forward on the field or to keep a metaphor going is going to be in Pennsylvania tonight interesting as we're seeing the Republican Party pulled back in a couple of key districts there and in other states
Yeah this is something that we typically see towards the end of the campaign particularly with the party that is maybe I'm On defense or that it's spreading the stand and in that case in this case that's Republicans you know there's upwards of
Seventy Republican House districts that are in play this cycle in an hour and that uh that field has been expanding and rather than contracting which is you know not a good sign for Republicans and so I think what we're seeing now is Republican basically strategically trying to focus what resources they do have in the time they have left
On races that think that they are they really think they can win and essentially cut their losses on races that might not be ... for them um and you know this is makes the makes it you know in some ways is this is a sign that they see that Democrats than a democratic surges really possible
